text: Marilyn Times Five is a 1973 experimental film by American filmmaker Bruce Conner. ==Plot== It is an exploration of how a film's form can influence audience perception of the content of film. MUBI For this film, the footage comes from Apple Knockers and Coke, a famous porno loop from the late '40s featuring Monroe look-alike Arline Hunter while the song "I'm Through With Love" Senses of Cinema by Marilyn herself is playing. title: Marilyn Times Five
